items.title: Is a 50-year mortgage really that much crazier than a 30-year one?
items.description: Last week, the internet piled on President Trump's proposal for a 50-year mortgage. But maybe it's not as crazy as it sounds.

items.title: How NewJeans (almost) changed K-pop
items.description: The girl group had a vision for how to rewire its troubled industry. The industry had other plans.
